target.name: create-build-properties
target.description: Copies the template properties file into build.properties

target.name: print-config-error-message
target.description: Prints some instructions on how to setup eclipse path for headless build
target.echo:
Build file missing correct paths to eclipse jar files and scripts needed to build and deploy the plugin. Edit file APAC_HOME/src/eclipse/build.properties and make sure properties target.eclipse.platform, target.eclipse.ant.launcher, and target.eclipse.pde.plugin point to the correct folder.
target.eclipse.platform should point to the root folder of your eclipse distribution. This folder should have the plugins folder in it.
target.eclipse.ant.launcher should point to the correct version of the equinox launcher. In the eclipse distribution plugin folder, look for org.eclipse.equinox.launcher* and copy that value with the correct version number to the build.properties file. For example: target.eclipse.ant.launcher=${target.eclipse.platform}/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.3.0.v20120522-1813.jar
target.eclipse.pde.plugin should point to the location of the eclipse pde plugin folder. In the eclipse distribution plugin folder, look for org.eclipse.pde.buikd* and copy that value with the correct version number to the build.properties file. For example: target.eclipse.pde.plugin=${target.eclipse.platform}/plugins/org.eclipse.pde.build_3.8.2.v20121114-140810
